Document: # Rule 1.6 Intentionally using and/or abusing exploits, bugs, or external programs are not allowed. - The moment you learn of a bug, you are expected to report it immediately and never intentionally use it again. - Some examples of external programs are as follows: autoclickers, macros, client cheats, etc. - Any form of cheating or hacking will immediately result in a permanent ban with no chance of appeal without a voucher from another reputable server.
